content.raw:
I thought about this problem a little more over the weekend, and I think this happens because we don't pass the sdf string through the joint.sdf parser, so it doesn't add the required parameters.

It would also be nice to check the GlobalAxis of the joint in the harness test.

I'll suggest patches for these changes.
content.html:
I thought about this problem a little more over the weekend, and I think this happens because we don't pass the sdf string through the joint.sdf parser, so it doesn't add the required parameters.

It would also be nice to check the GlobalAxis of the joint in the harness test.

I'll suggest patches for these changes.
